page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content:
This block is within commuting distance of London yet is unspoilt,quiet and beautiful, and is largely occupied by the moderately wealthy, as agricultural labour has been superseded by the machine. Only three working farms now exist. Farm houses and cottages are now homes for professional or retired people.
Approximately 90% of homes are owner-occupied, and of the l00 - 200 year old cottage style, partly built of local sandstone and brick, with tile hanging, well modernised with lovingly tended gardens. Some l0% of owner-occupied homes are large enough to require domestic staff. There is little new building (post
